column5: Friend is thinking to Six Mile Lake this week and wanted to know if there is a public launch for this lake.  Thanks, Mike
He'd be better off on Gloucester Pool.
There are no free launches.   Six Mile Lake Provincial Park has an excellent ramp and good parking and you can get a day pass.  Bill
I second 6 mile provincial park. I've caught bass casting right from the launch before putting the boat in!
I launched at Six mile lake marina if I am not mistaken and I don't recall paying anything....I don't even think it was open. But it was around 7am.
